Title: 400 - Menus and User Commands
Tip: Use the shape model as a shared resource to create menus and other UI elements.

Summary.What: Define the command actions as part of the shape model. The write code to project the 'view' through out the solution.
Summary.Why: Code is simplified and reliability is improved, when there is a single action for each command.
Summary.How: Delegate the command details to a common object, use functions with closures as necessary.
